New Adult DVDs

New arrivals added to our DVD Collection in the last 7 days

View all on one page

Sign up for new DVD emails

Title Date added
The rake's progress Year Published: 2011

May 7, 2012
The rebound Year Published: 2012

After dumping her unfaithful husband, a single mother moves with her kids to a Manhattan apartment. The demands of her new job force her to hire a young coffee shop clerk to be her nanny. When romance blooms, they must decide if it is true love or a rebound.

 Apr 30, 2012
The school for scandal Year Published: 1975

This comedy of manners satirizes the extravagance and corruption of London society. A deliciously nasty tale of intrigue, slander and clandestine love.

 May 7, 2012
The shield. Season 1 Year Published: 2008

Detective Vic Mackey is the leader of an elite Strike Team unit, a group of cops effective at eliminating crime but also operating under Vic's own set of rules. But his rules sometimes cross the fine line between legal and illegal. Now the precinct has a new captain who doesn't like Vic's tactics and wants to bust him off the force-- even as the captain finds himself going to Vic for help whenever the going gets rough.

 May 7, 2012
The Sunset Limited Year Published: 2012

A searing two-character drama about the choices people frequently make: to go on or give in to despair. Set in a New York tenement apartment, the story focuses on two very different men: a black ex-con who claims to hear the voice of Jesus, and the white professor he stopped from throwing himself in front of an oncoming train.

 May 3, 2012
Through a lens darkly grief, loss and C.S. Lewis Year Published: 2011

Loss comes in many forms: the grief over the death of a loved one, the devastation of a physical or mental impairment, the pain of divorce or separation, or the distress of job loss and foreclosure. The physical and emotional responses to grief can be as heart wrenching as the loss itself. So where does a person turn for answers and encouragement in a time of despair, doubt, and fear? Through a Lens Darkly uplifts the soul with the moving stories of people touched by a significant loss.

 May 7, 2012
Thunder soul Year Published: 2012

The story of high school band leader "Prof" Johnson, who took the jazz band of Kashmere High School, Houston, and transformed them into the legendary funk powerhouse in the 1970s. Now decades later, his students prepare to gather and celebrate him.

 Apr 30, 2012
Titanic Year Published: 2012

Brought to life by a stellar, award-winning ensemble cast and featuring stunning visual effects, Titanic is an extraordinary retelling of the doomed voyage that follows the destinies of the Titanic's victims and survivors as their stories of passion, betrayal, and hope unfold amidst the tragic events of the ship's final hours.

 Apr 30, 2012
Titanic Year Published: 2012

Brought to life by a stellar, award-winning ensemble cast and featuring stunning visual effects, Titanic is an extraordinary retelling of the doomed voyage that follows the destinies of the Titanic's victims and survivors as their stories of passion, betrayal, and hope unfold amidst the tragic events of the ship's final hours.

 May 7, 2012
Titanoboa - monster snake Year Published: 2012

Meet Tatanoboa: She's longer than a bus, eats crocodiles for breakfast and makes the anaconda look like a garter snake. How could something so massive remain hidden for 60 million years? The world's largest snake was discovered deep in a Columbian coal mine. Follow scientist to the mines, into the labs and on an expedition that delves into the discovery, reconstruction and implications of this enormous reptile.

 May 7, 2012
Too late blues Year Published: 1961

Ghost is an idealogical musician who would rather play his blues in the park to the birds than compromise himself. However, when he meets and falls in love with a beautiful singer, she comes between him and his band members, and he leaves his dreams behind in search of fame.

 May 7, 2012
Torchwood: miracle day Year Published: 2012

When convicted child killer Oswald Danes miraculously survives his own execution, the footage holds America transfixed. And then everyone realizes that nobody is dying. All across the world, nobody dies. And then the next day, and the next, and the next. People keep aging, they get hurt and sick, but they never die.

 Apr 30, 2012
Toxic tears

May 3, 2012
Trouble with harry Year Published: 1955

The discovery of a body in a Vermont town causes lots of problems and questions.

 May 7, 2012
Trust the man Year Published: 2012

Overachieving actress Rebecca must come to grips with her failing marriage to stay-at-home dad Tom. Meanwhile, Rebecca's slacker brother, Tobey, can't seem to commit to his aspiring-novelist girlfriend, Elaine. As both relationships spin out of control, the two couples embark on a hilarious quest to rediscover the magic and romance of falling in love in New York.

 May 7, 2012
Tyler perry's aunt bam's place Year Published: 2012

When family's falling out, it's time to call in Aunt Bam to set a few things straight! The fun begins when Bam's favorite nephew-in-law, Stewart, is granted weekend visitation with his children. He and his new wife are thrilled at the chance until Stewart's drunken ex shows up with trouble in mind. Now it's up to Bam to calm things down in this high-spirited new play from Tyler Perry.

 May 7, 2012
Tyler perry's good deeds Year Published: 2012

A successful, wealthy businessman, Wesley Deeds has always done what's expected of him, whether it's assuming the helm of his father's company, tolerating his brother's misbehavior at the office or planning to marry his beautiful but restless fiance, Natalie. But Wesley is jolted out of his predictable routine when he meets Lindsey, a down-on-her-luck single mother who works as a cleaning person in his office building. Outspoken, impulsive and proud, and also recently evicted, Lindsey struggles

May 2, 2012
U.S. Marshals Year Published: 2009

U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard is back with his team of marshals, assigned to track down Mark Sheridan, a murderer and robber. At the same time, Sheridan is out to find the truth himself while keeping one step ahead of Gerard.

 May 7, 2012
Under the boardwalk the Monopoly story Year Published: 2012

The classic board game that has been played by over a billion people in the last 75 years, Monopoly is a worldwide cultural phenomenon. In this feature-length documentary, stories are captured about the game and those who play it. Following the colorful players who come together to compete for the title of Monopoly World Champion, this engaging film illustrates how the classic board game became a worldwide cultural phenomenon.

 Apr 30, 2012
W. E. Year Published: 2012

Pop icon Madonna returns to the director's seat for the first time since her 2008 feature debut, FILTH AND WISDOM, for this ambitious romance detailing one lonely woman's obsession with the relationship between King Edward VIII (James D'Arcy) and American divorcee Wallis Simpson (Andrea Riseborough). To Wally Winthrop (Abbie Cornish), no act of devotion in history is more romantic than King Edward VIII abdicating the throne to be with his one true love. But the deeper Wally dives into the backgr

 May 7, 2012
